content:
We have releases a new version of the FHIR .NET API: version 1.2.0-beta1 with R4 support.

This first beta of 1.2 includes support for FHIR version R4! In the coming period we will investigate the performance of this release and take the last bugs out (if there are any :wink: ). We will probably release a second beta, or if we are real confident about this beta1, we will create a final release 1.2.0.

You can find the 1.2.0-beta1 packages on NuGet and the sources are on GitHub. The release notes of this version you can find here

Happy coding,
the Firely team
